topic.title: What do you think the result of "Hate Speech" policies in countries such as the UK will be?
topic.body: Alternative view: It's irrelevant so long as tech platforms are enforcing their own "Hate Speech" policies as codes of conduct.

1553607490_1NYxK9cC899pvxFuCt6eE53APoueD.body:
> [mea](#comment_3_1NxwuqmLNiF2K8djAP56uxATgi3xDhRi3V): You guys need marketing. Yes, there will be a natural influx, but if you do some marketing on top of that you could make the influx even bigger. [...]

I joined because of the whole article 13 thing. Hopefully more people do.
